item.title: Prospective Sarasota County lobbyist is major GOP fundraiser
item.description: Over the next two weeks, Sarasota County commissioners will decide whether to replace its longtime Tallahassee lobbying firm with one that has deep ties to developer campaign money and Republican politics.

item.title: Football Recruiting 2026: Florida high school summer…
Here's the 2025 team-by-team Sarasota and Manatee high…
item.description: The 2025 high school football season begins with Florida High School Athletic Association Kickoff Classics on Aug. 14. The regular season begins Aug. 21 and runs through Oct. 31 (with the exception of IMG which will play into November) with most teams playing 10 games in 11 weeks.

item.title: DeSantis targets rising Florida property taxes amid home value surge
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis in recent months has zeroed in on local governments throughout the state, criticizing some for approving large increases in property taxes in recent years as home values have risen.
